FuncDef: The display alarm active root command displays information about active root alarms.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays detailed information about active root alarms.
-

Examples: AlarmType   : quality_of_service    Severity  : Major            State : active

Description : The storage usage exceeded the pre-set overload threshold.(TrapSeverity=4, ProbableCause=75265, EventType=3, PhysicalIndex=17956865, PhysicalName=xxxx, RelativeResource=cfcard, UsageType=5, SubIndex=1, UsageValue=89, Unit=1, UsageThreshold=85)
Sequence   AlarmId    Level Date Time  Description
6          0xD300007  2     2020-01-18 The storage usage exceeded the pre-set ov
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check information about active root alarms after you enable alarm correlation analysis using the correlation-analyze enable command, run the display alarm active root command.
